mapper.sql: ID, parentid, agent, name, code, password, telephone, mobilephone, email, ownindustry, orgname, usertype, accounttype, prices, realname, idcard, image, birthday, gender, address, family_member, note, fileaddress, companyfullname, companyshortname, province, city, companycode, operateruser, status, endtime, maxLanMuNumber, maxKeyWordNumber, beizhu, authority, subjecttimes, microopen, monitortimes, warntimes, persontimes, expirydate, cloudtimes, childtimes, usertimes, registertime, managerid, startdate,typecode
mapper.select:
select user.id,user.typecode,user.managerid,user.usertype,user.expirydate expirytime, user.agent,user.name,user.telephone,user.mobilephone,user.email,user.ownindustry, user.orgname,user.usertype,user.accounttype, user.idcard, user.address,user.companyfullname,user.companyshortname, user.province, user.city,user.companycode, user.operateruser,user.status,t.checkdays, t.subjecttimes,t.persontimes,t.keywordNum,t.monitortimes,t.warntimes,t.subjectReport,t.cloudtimes,t.dayReport,weekReport,monthReport, t.modalNum,t.expirdate,t.setTrade,t.childtimes,t.microopen,t.setReport,t.isupdate,t.emphasisnum,t.loginnum,t.ismedia,t.emotionname,t.evalue from ( SELECT userid, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN setword END) subsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN cansetword END) subjecttimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN setword END) personsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN cansetword END) persontimes,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='重点关注个数' THEN cansetword END) emphasisnum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN setword END) keywordsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN cansetword END) keywordNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN setword END) monsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN cansetword END) monitortimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN setword END) warnsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN cansetword END) warntimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN setword END) sreportsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN cansetword END) subjectReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='查询天数' THEN cansetword END) checkdays,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN setword END) cloudsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN cansetword END) cloudtimes,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='日报开通' THEN status END) dayReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='周报开通' THEN status END) weekReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='月报开通' THEN status END) monthReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='模板可选择数量' THEN cansetword END) modalNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='有效期限' THEN cansetword END) expirdate, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='交易开通' THEN status END) setTrade, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='子账号个数' THEN cansetword END) childtimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='登录账号个数' THEN cansetword END) loginnum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='微监测开通' THEN status END) microopen, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人工报告开通' THEN status END) setReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='操作开通' THEN isupdate END) isupdate, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='媒体开通' THEN status END) ismedia, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='负面精确度' THEN emotionname END) emotionname, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='负面精确度' THEN evalue END) evalue FROM bs_wordset GROUP BY userid ) t inner join bs_user user on t.userid=`user`.id where t.userid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT u.orgname,u.name,u.id,u.maxlanmunumber,u.maxkeywordnumber,u.usertype,u.registertime,u.startdate,s.userid,s.subjecttimes,s.ressubjectNum,s.resPersonNum,s.persontimes, s.keywordNum,s.reskeywordNum,s.monitortimes,s.resmiroNum, s.warntimes,s.resyujingNum,s.subjectReport, s.resreportNum, s.cloudtimes,s.rescloudNum,s.dayReport,s.weekReport,s.monthReport,s.modalNum,u.expirydate from bs_user u left join (
SELECT tt.userid,tt.subsetword,tt.subjecttimes,tt.subjecttimes-tt.subsetword ressubjectNum,persontimes,personsetword, persontimes - personsetword resPersonNum, keywordsetword,keywordNum,tt.keywordNum - tt.keywordsetword reskeywordNum, tt.monsetword,tt.monitortimes,tt.monitortimes - tt.monsetword resmiroNum, tt.warnsetword,tt.warntimes,tt.warntimes - tt.warnsetword resyujingNum, tt.sreportsetword,tt.subjectReport,tt.subjectReport - tt.sreportsetword resreportNum, tt.cloudsetword,tt.cloudtimes,tt.cloudtimes - tt.cloudsetword rescloudNum, tt.dayReport,tt.weekReport,tt.monthReport,tt.modalNum-tt.smodalNum modalNum,tt.expirydate FROM( SELECT userid, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN setword END) subsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专题个数' THEN cansetword END) subjecttimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN setword END) personsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人物个数' THEN cansetword END) persontimes,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN setword END) keywordsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='关键词个数' THEN cansetword END) keywordNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN setword END) monsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='两微一端监测项' THEN cansetword END) monitortimes,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN setword END) warnsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='预警信息设置个数' THEN cansetword END) warntimes, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN setword END) sreportsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='专报生成次数' THEN cansetword END) subjectReport,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN setword END) cloudsetword, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='云搜索次数' THEN cansetword END) cloudtimes,
MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='日报开通' THEN status END) dayReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='周报开通' THEN status END) weekReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='月报开通' THEN status END) monthReport, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='模板可选择数量' THEN cansetword END) modalNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='模板可选择数量' THEN setword END) smodalNum, MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='有效期限' THEN endtime END) expirydate FROM bs_wordset GROUP BY userid )tt) s on s.userid = u.id where 1=1
and u.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id,orgname from bs_user where status='1'
select u.id,u.orgname from bs_user as u left join ( SELECT userid,MAX(CASE WHEN NAME='人工报告开通' THEN status END) renReport FROM bs_wordset GROUP BY userid) as w on w.userid = u.id where w.renReport='1'

select
from bs_user where password = #{password,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and (name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or mobilephone = #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} or email = #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: insert into bs_user (ID, parentid, agent, name, code, password, telephone, mobilephone, email, ownindustry, orgname, usertype, accounttype, prices, realname, idcard, image, birthday, gender, address, family_member, note, fileaddress, companyfullname, companyshortname, province, city, companycode, operateruser, status, endtime, maxLanMuNumber, maxKeyWordNumber, beizhu, authority, subjecttimes, microopen, monitortimes, warntimes, persontimes, expirydate, cloudtimes, childtimes, usertimes, registertime, startdate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownindustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prices,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyMember,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyfullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyshortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateruser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maxlanmunumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxkeywordnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{microopen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitortimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warntimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{persontimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expirydate,}, #{cloudtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{childtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usertimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update bs_user
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent = #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ownindustry = #{ownindustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgname = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accounttype = #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prices = #{prices,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
family_member = #{familyMember,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileaddress = #{fileaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyfullname = #{companyfullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyshortname = #{companyshortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companycode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operateruser = #{operateruser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
maxLanMuNumber = #{maxlanmunumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
maxKeyWordNumber = #{maxkeywordnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beizhu = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authority = #{authority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
subjecttimes = #{subjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
microopen = #{microopen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitortimes = #{monitortimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
warntimes = #{warntimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
persontimes = #{persontimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cloudtimes = #{cloudtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
childtimes = #{childtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usertimes = #{usertimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
typecode = #{typecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1
and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bs_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ownindustry = #{ownindustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileaddress = #{fileaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyfullname = #{companyfullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyshortname = #{companyshortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companycode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bs_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ownindustry = #{ownindustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileaddress = #{fileaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyfullname = #{companyfullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyshortname = #{companyshortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companycode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typecode = #{typecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bs_user set parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent = #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownindustry = #{ownindustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgname = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounttype = #{accounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prices = #{prices,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_member = #{familyMember,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileaddress = #{fileaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyfullname = #{companyfullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyshortname = #{companyshortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companycode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operateruser = #{operateruser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, maxLanMuNumber = #{maxlanmunumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maxKeyWordNumber = #{maxkeywordnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beizhu = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority = #{authority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subjecttimes = #{subjecttimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, microopen = #{microopen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitortimes = #{monitortimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warntimes = #{warntimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, persontimes = #{persontimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expirydate = #{expirydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cloudtimes = #{cloudtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, childtimes = #{childtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usertimes = #{usertimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bs_user set
startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expirydate = #{expirydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typecode = #{typecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bs_user where name=#{name} and password=#{password}

from bs_user where name=#{name}
